commands.command: CREATE TABLE client ( id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, name varchar(25), surname varchar(25), address varchar(50) )
CREATE TABLE `supplier` ( `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, `name` varchar(25) , `surname` varchar(25) , `address` varchar(50) )
CREATE TABLE `product` ( `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, `name` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, `description` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL , `price` FLOAT(13,3) NOT NULL )
CREATE TABLE `purchase_order_header` ( `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, `id_client` INT, `purchased_on` DATE, FOREIGN KEY (id_client) REFERENCES client(id) )

CREATE TABLE `purchase_order_line`( `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, `id_header` INT , `id_product` INT, `quantity` FLOAT(5,3), FOREIGN KEY (id_header) REFERENCES purchase_order_header(id), FOREIGN KEY (id_product) REFERENCES product(id) )
